infotexts.loadingscreentip: [OASIS] Many food items can be crafted using pomegrenades. Start a farm.
[OASIS] Ghosts show up on thermal scanners and health HUDs.
[OASIS] Ghosts can cause heavy distortion on your sonar monitor.
[OASIS] Ghosts and special husks start spawning at Difficulty 25.
[OASIS] Keep your distance from Volatile Husks when attacking them.
[OASIS] Keep your distance from Caustic Husks when attacking them.
[OASIS] Keep your distance from Hardsuit Husks when attacking them.
[OASIS] Thanks to Vollidiot for donating.
[VOLLIDIOT] The Fabricator can be a great tool, but don't let yourself get lost in it.
[OASIS] Thanks to Cpl Chuckles for donating.
[OASIS] Thanks to whitegote for donating.
[OASIS] Thanks to Tony Salisbury for donating.
[TONY] touch grass
[TONY] Kissing your fellow crewmates can encourage teamwork and boost morale.
[OASIS] Thanks to Frogsy for donating.
[OASIS] Thanks to Bulletsite for donating.
[OASIS] Gas grenades have a short range, but can have very potent lingering effects.
[OASIS] Create Pomegrenade Aerosol Grenades to heal a group of people.
[OASIS] Sulphuric Acid Aerosol Grenades are devastating against crowds.
[OASIS] Riot Grenades are excellent for non-lethally breaking up a group.
[OASIS] Genetic Flaying is a cheap but risky way to get permanent genetic effects.
[OASIS] Unwanted mutations? Radiation sickness? Craft a Genetic Stabilizer.
[OASIS] Calyxanide Aerosol Grenades are an excellent option for containing Husk outbreaks.
[OASIS] If you like this mod, consider donating at patreon.com/OASIS0460
[OASIS] If you want to give feedback and suggestions, consider joining the Baronyx Discord. https://discord.gg/GmYxvT8Grt
[OASIS] Administrator? Try spawning in some of the fun and "secret" items.
[OASIS] The death of clowns may lead to the creation of powerful artifacts.
[OASIS] Bennit Donnacrypt is a quirked up white boy goated with the disney sauce.
[OASIS] The Coalition denies all rumors of a "cursed blue horn."
[RADIATED] If you see a blue bike horn, you should honk it at everyone you see.
[SETHEA] hot femboy thighs in medical
[VOLLIDIOT] Avoid mentioning femboy thighs.
[OASIS] Never take the OASIS community seriously.
[OASIS] Diving Knives can cut the meat right off a creature's bones.
[OASIS] Juggernaut Suits are an excellent way to resist gunfire, but they are useless against almost everything else.
[OASIS] Trap, trap, trap, trap, trap, trap, trap, metal, uhh
[OASIS] Neptune V's no place to settle, shitsec come to meddle, uhh
[OASIS] Headshots with my Samorodok, never accidental, uhh
[OASIS] Admin Abuse will guide me even though they call me mental uhh
[OASIS] Honk, honk, honk, honk, honk, honk, honk, bikehorn, uhh
[OASIS] Europa's no place to settle, honkists come to meddle, uhh
[OASIS] Implosions with my Toy Hammer, never accidental, uhh
[OASIS] Honk of Honks will guide me even though they call me honker uhh
[OASIS] The Swarmfeeder Queen can easily stunlock those who stray too close.
[OASIS] The swarmfeeders are under your skin. Get them out. Rip off your skin.
[OASIS] skill issue
[OASIS] Many cultists revere the Husk Titan as a god.
[OASIS] According to rumor, there is a mysterious mask that turns its wearer into an unstoppable killing machine. Attempts to replicate this mask have all ended in abject failure.
[OASIS] You are currently using the mainline version of OASIS Mod. Make sure you're subscribed to all the mods this overrides.
[OASIS] The Hammerhead Rifle can be a devastating weapon against monsters, but it has poor damage characteristics against humans.
[OASIS] Remote Detonators can be an excellent tool for any occasion.
[OASIS] Tell the Assistant to grab the Volatile Artifact.
[OASIS] Medicine has weight. If you carry too much, you might find yourself overencumbered and taking more damage while trying to flee from danger.
[OASIS]
infotexts.talentdescription.encroachingterror: You like to play with your victims and give them a chance to escape. Those who refuse to play your game will meet your blade, and you attack [maxattackspeed]% faster with melee weapons. While your identity is concealed by a suit, you move much faster, but you attack much slower with all weapons. The downside to all of this is that you dislike ranged weapons and refuse to use them to their full potential.
infotexts.talentdescription.slaughter: Like cattle, they will come for you. You are the butcher. Show no mercy, have no remorse.
infotexts.talentdescription.lightningwizardoasis: If you have not been attacked for [seconds] seconds, the next attack you suffer has [powerreduction]% less power and your attacker receives a moderate amount of Incremental Stun.
infotexts.talentdescription.youarenothing: If you have not been attacked for [seconds] seconds, the next attack you suffer has [powerreduction]% less power and your attacker receives a moderate amount of Penance.
infotexts.talentdescription.counter: If you have not been attacked for [seconds] seconds, the next attack you suffer has [powerreduction]% less power and your attacker receives a small amount of damage.
infotexts.talentdescription.inquisition: In the name of the One Who Grips.
infotexts.talentdescription.oasischonkyhonks: Honking your horn will have a [chance]% temporarily improve ally firepower and physical damage resistance by [power]% for [duration]. It will also stun nearby enemies for [duration2] second.
infotexts.talentdescription.truebeliever: While wearing Cultist Robes and a Cultist Hood, you will be invisible to demonic entities and gain immunity to most of their powers. You recover from Penance, Condemned, and Hollow quicker.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.penance.low: It doesn't seem to be possible to shake this lingering sense of dread.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.penance: It feels like something is being taken..
infotexts.afflictiondescription.hollow.low: Apathy is setting in, affecting the patient's ability to work.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.hollow: The patient seems to be suffering more drastic injuries and their greatest skills are rapidly deteriorating. Despite this, there are no signs of tangible damage or illness.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.hollow.high: The patient's eyes no longer shine and everything feels dull to them. Whatever is done cannot be undone.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.temphollow.low: You've been exposed to cursed energy, but it is not much of a threat.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.temphollow: You should avoid rituals and demons until you recover.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.condemned.low: A burning sensation has begun to replace the patient's apathy, but sensors do not report a fever.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.condemned: The patient is beginning to suffer a fever that is growing more and more hazardous.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.frozen.low: A sensation similar to pins and needles can be felt in the affected area.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.frozen: The affected area has gone completely numb and even moving it is a challenge.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.whisper.self: You should put a blank page into a summoning circle. Read the paper that comes out, then use it in your health interface. Eat it.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thrallcurse.critic: You shall drown in the Deep.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.high.self: You feel a considerable buzz and an alleviation from all that ails you.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.high: The patient seems a little distant and erratic.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.high.severe: The patient is high as a kite!
infotexts.afflictiondescription.stabledecay.self: The rot has subsided, and it seems like you can finally rest easy.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.stabledecay: The patient's Abyssal Decay is no longer advancing.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.flammable.self: Your clothes are saturated with a significant amount of flammable material. Stay away from flames.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.flammable: The patient's clothes are saturated with flammable material. Keep them away from flames!
infotexts.jobdescription.prisoner: Regardless of the crime you were convicted of, you're in the brig now. It might pay to cooperate if you want your freedom quicker.
infotexts.jobdescription.santa: Santa Claus himself, bringer of joy.
infotexts.jobdescription.oasisjovianstandard: A Jovian who has enough experience to have acquired better gear for himself.
infotexts.jobdescription.oasisjovianelite: A Jovian who has seen his fair share of raids and overthrown authorities.
infotexts.jobdescription.oasiscoalitionstandard: A Coalition conscript who has enough experience to have acquired better gear for himself.
infotexts.jobdescription.oasiscoalitionelite: A Coalition conscript who has seen his fair share of dead monster swarms and crushed uprisings.
infotexts.jobdescription.subjugator: A Coalition officer specialized in riot control.
infotexts.jobdescription.cleaner: A Coalition officer specialized in elimination.
infotexts.jobdescription.marine: A Coalition officer often deployed as reinforcements.
infotexts.jobdescription.deputy: Deputies are lower-ranking Security Officers who are also skilled in secondary trades such as maintenance of the submarine's systems.
infotexts.jobdescription.purifier: One who works in service of the One who Grips.
infotexts.jobdescription.oasiseldercultist: A herald of the Old Ones.
infotexts.jobdescription.whiteglovecasual: Whiteglove Janitors are very good at cleaning up unwanted stains.
infotexts.jobdescription.whitegloveformal: Whiteglove Associates are better at dealing with political opponents.

override.talentdescription.tandemfire: As long as you are manning a turret alongside another allied crewmember, both of your attacks are [amount]% more powerful and you gain immunity to stun and waterflow. Only the closest allied crewmember gains this effect.
